member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContacts
member.summary: Contacts module

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContacts.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The Page_Load event handler on this User Control is used to obtain a DataReader of contact information from the Contacts table, and then databind the results to a DataGrid server control. It uses the Appleseed.ContactsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContacts.#ctor
member.summary: Construcotor - set module settings

member.summary: Searchable module implementation
member.param: ID of the user is searching
The fields where perfoming the search
member.returns: The SELECT sql to perform a search on the current module

member.name: P:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContacts.Searchable

member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB
member.summary: Class that encapsulates all data logic necessary to add/query/delete contacts within the Portal database.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB.GetContacts(System.Int32,Appleseed.Framework.Site.Configuration.Appleseed.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary:
The GetContacts method returns a DataSet containing all of the contacts for a specific portal module from the contacts database.
NOTE: A DataSet is returned from this method to allow this method to support both desktop and mobile Web UI.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB.GetSingleContact(System.Int32,Appleseed.Framework.Site.Configuration.Appleseed.Framework.WorkFlowVersion)
member.summary: The GetSingleContact method returns a SqlDataReader containing details about a specific contact from the Contacts database table.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB.DeleteContact(System.Int32)
member.summary: The DeleteContact method deletes the specified contact from the Contacts database table.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB.AddContact(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The AddContact method adds a new contact to the Contacts database table, and returns the ItemID value as a result.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsDB.UpdateContact(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: The UpdateContact method updates the specified contact within the Contacts database table.

member.name: T:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit
member.summary: Page for editing contacts

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.Page_Load(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary:
The Page_Load event on this Page is used to obtain the ModuleID and ItemID of the contact to edit.
It then uses the Appleseed.ContactsDB() data component to populate the page's edit controls with the contact details.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.OnUpdate(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The UpdateBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to either create or update a contact. It uses the Appleseed.ContactsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.OnDelete(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: The DeleteBtn_Click event handler on this Page is used to delete an a contact. It uses the Appleseed.ContactsDB() data component to encapsulate all data functionality.

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.OnInit(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Raises OnInitEvent

member.name: M:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.InitializeComponent
member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: P:Appleseed.Content.Web.ModulesContactsEdit.AllowedModules
member.summary: Set the module guids with free access to this page
